src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/vtkdump.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Save order parameter, pressure, and velocity data in VTK format for the parallel D3Q7/D3Q19 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM. Filenames are 'DATA_YYY_XXXXXXX.VTK' where YYY is the processor number and XXXXXXX is the time step. These files are understood by Paraview.
